ygData.subject: RE: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: We already get a damage shield song.  Two of them in fact. Elwyn Heartstring Level 40 Bard Erollisi Marr ... From: Arwen [mailto:arwen@gte.net] Sent: Tuesday,
ygData.messageBody:
We already get a damage shield song. Two of them in fact.

Elwyn Heartstring
Level 40 Bard
Erollisi Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Arwen [mailto:arwen@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 6:07 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Petiton to replace level 14 song


From: "Arwen" <arwen@...>

Dear fellow bards I wholeheartedly agree with Gatlin on the relative
uselesness of the lvl 14 song....here is my thought on a possible
replacement to it.

Song of Thorns

A party effect that is a damage shield for few ticks of damage, not unlike
a thistlecoat effect. It is DEFINATELY level appropriate as druids get their
shields early on.

Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 40th Chorus
Innoruuk Server
